title: Executive Order 5720-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Gladys W. Eldridge
content: Mrs. Gladys W. Eldridge may be appointed to a clerical position in the Department of Agriculture without regard to the civil-service requirements.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5720-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Gladys W. Eldridge Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361298
